Side Effects: My 6 year old son began this med (to address EEG abnormalities) with an increasing dosage schedule.He developed a bad rash that looked similar to this:http://www.soft-water-skin-care.com/image-files/types-of-skin-rash-01.jpgApparently_ this is a known (although rare) side-effect of Banzel.  After stopping the med_ it took about 10 days for the rash to disappear.
